pr_title: Fix spotbugs in identity tests and samples.

timeline.message: Fix spotbugs in identity tests and samples.

timeline.bodyText: Are tokens guaranteed to be ASCII only? If not it may be better to use StandardCharset.UTF_8 here as the defaultCharset is specific to the machine. Linux and Mac will default UTF-8 while Windows defaults CP1252.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText:
yeah, ASCII covers tokens char range.
This is test code. So, if any failures are ever encountered, it'd interesting to look at and we can fix it.
replies.author: g2vinay
